snippet: Their countrymen may be swept up in a wave of Neymar euphoria after his two goals against Croatia, but Brazil's philosophy teachers are firmly behind another leading striker - Didier Drogba of the Ivory Coast....

headline.print_headline: Drogba the Main Man for Brazilian Philosophy Teachers
headline.main: Drogba the Main Man for Brazilian Philosophy Teachers

lead_paragraph: Their countrymen may be swept up in a wave of Neymar euphoria after his two goals against Croatia, but Brazil's philosophy teachers are firmly behind another leading striker - Didier Drogba of the Ivory Coast.
